# Plot the data from each dataset using a scatter plot.

```{r}
# Scatter Plot
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data, aes(x= burglary, y=murder)) + geom_point() + ggtitle("Scatter Plot R")
```

```{r}
# Bubble Plot
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data, aes(x= burglary, y=murder, size=population)) + geom_point() + ggtitle("Bubble Chart R")
```

```{r}
# Step Chart
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data, aes(x=burglary)) + geom_density(fill="black") + ggtitle("Density Plot R")

```
